results.title: Home away from home
results.creator_credit: Umit Ugur, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Unlike other immigrants, Umit Ugur didn’t move to Australia in 1981 for economic reasons, instead he migrated here because of love.

results.title: Home at seven
results.creator_credit: Eric Muller, Paul Gray, Vauxhall Motors Film Unit and British Information Services
results.brief_description: The reliability of the modern British motor-car owes much to the skill of the designers and engineers associated with the development of a new model. Describes the design, manufacture, and testing of Vauxhall cars, with emphasis on reliable performance under hard, daily motoring conditions. Skills involved in preparing for a mass production run are also illustrated.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Eric Muller, Paul Gray, Vauxhall Motors Film Unit and British Information Services

results.title: Home and school
results.creator_credit: Gerry Bryant, Alexander Shaw and Crown Film Unit
results.brief_description: The story of two typical well-meaning parents who provide everything they possibly can for the physical well-being of their children; consequently, they fail to understand why their children are so often disobedient, defiant, and generally unmanageable. In desperation, the mother seeks the advice of the headmistress of the children’s school; both parents later attend a meeting of the Parents and Teachers Association, and learn something of the methods and aims of modern education. They apply what they have learned to their relationships with their own children, with gratifying results.

results.title: Home and dry (TEFC)
results.brief_description: A brief explanation of incontinence, its causes and treatment. Discusses how it may be managed and how it can often be cured. The majority of suferers have “disorders of nervous control of micturition”. Incontinence is a common presenting symptom of disease in old age.

results.title: Home and beauty
results.brief_description:
Episode number 11 of Series “This Modern Age”.
This film gives a survey of homes in Britain from Georgian times until today, tracing in particular the development of style and decoration.

results.title: Home and away (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Eurfron Gwynne Jones and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Children Growing Up”.
The most important event in the life of most five year olds is starting school. With this comes a widening of relationships to include teachers and friends. It is not always an easy step and some children are disturbed by it.

results.title: Home alone. Home alone 2 = Lost in New York
results.creator_credit: Chris Colombus, John Hughes and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Home alone is one of the most successful comedies of the eighties and stars pint-sized hero Macaulay Culkin. In a chaotic frenzy to get to the airport on time, the McCallister family forget one thing - eight year old Kevin. When two bungling burglars attempt to break into the McCallister household, Kevin is left home alone to defend himself and his house. He outwits the burglars by waging war the only way he knows how, with outlandish, yet effective boyhood pranks. Cast includes Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard and John Candy. In the sequel to “Home alone” it’s Kevin who manages to isolate himself from the rest of the family when he boards the wrong plane at Christmastime and finds himself in New York city. He’s not alone for long however, as he quickly befriends a pigeon-lady and, once again crosses paths with two well known dim witted criminals. Cast includes Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern and Brenda Fricker.

results.title: Home alone (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Chris Columbus, John Hughes and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: This is one of the most successful comedies of the eighties and stars pint-sized hero Macaulay Culkin. In a chaotic frenzy to get to the airport on time, the McCallister family forget one thing - eight year old Kevin. When two bungling burglars attempt to break into the McCallister household, Kevin is left home alone to defend himself and his house. He outwits the burglars by waging war the only way he knows how. A John Hughes film co-starring Joe Pesci, “Home alone” is a modern-day classic.
